txt.en:
After being denied the honour on the Pelennor Fields, Raghathai has come to Minas Tirith to put an end to the Steward's son.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat Raghathai, Faramir's Bane
* Defeat Raghathai, Faramir's Bane in less than 30 seconds for full merit gain
Defeat Raghathai, Faramir's Bane before he escapes into the city.
<rgb=#FF0000>DNT has escaped defeat in the tumult of combat!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
You have allowed TBD to sow chaos on the wall for too long!
